title: I just saw a short, anime-style LoL ad on Adult Swim and I have some brief feedback

replies.body: All the recent LoL ads and commercials have been absolute garbage.

No bumper ad (which is what they all are) is meant to give you a rundown of what the game is. Just get you excited for it.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fUAOH7ex64k

Like what does this tell you about WoW? Unless you know about WoW, fucking nothing except dude getting on bus does not like lady for having sticker while big guy has red sticker that means he's GOOD PEOPLE.

Comparatively

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ibUlOM3uOJY

Hell does this tell you about League other than it's on a computer? BIG SWORD MAN FIGHT SWORD DEMON THEN GETS UP WITH A N G E R Y

It's not meant to sell you on the game, it's meant to make you go "lol holy fuck that's so dumb but also really cool" like any teenager would probably say at something so dumb but also a little cool. Then you go look up the game and (hopefully) play.

I feel like both of those ads are more of a refresher ad. Lots of people who play games (in general) , stop playing (because of personal reasons), then come back after a few months (or years). Sometimes all it takes is an ad highlighting that the game is still alive, or that there's an update to get them to come back.

Coke and Pepsi do this kind of "hey just a reminder we're still here" type of advertising a lot. They're not trying to introduce you to the flavors or the benefits of drinking their product, the ad is just something crazy and attention grabbing and then the logo appears when you look. The "brand reinforcement" ads aren't meant to draw in new consumers, just to snag the attention and bring back (or keep) the older ones.

But like. The WoW one is kinda nostalgic to the "horde vs alliance faction pride" that a lot of players remember contributing to. The league one is trying to draw some parallel with basketball (and I guess anime), which doesn't really incite any emotion.
Wait, what? There's LoL ads on TV...?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g7lKiyBox8o Have a link.

> [{quoted}](name=Support Position,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=qttJcWx2,comment-id=00080002,timestamp=2018-10-27T07:21:27.213+0000)
>
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g7lKiyBox8o Have a link.

What the hell is that Tank Dempsey voice? to my knowledge there is no league champion with that voice.
The voice is that robot you see at the beginning, he is the host of Toonami

That's the esteemed Steve Blum! I'd love for him to voice a League Champ.

> [{quoted}](name=Scathlocke,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=qttJcWx2,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-10-27T04:17:28.068+0000)
>
> Wait, what? There's LoL ads on TV...?

Scathlocke is just like: "Who approved this???"

I just didn't know this existed. :-)

I'm familiar with Toonami. This is pretty cool, actually. There's nothing in there that I'd call an "ad", though? More a celebration of the CGs and animations that League has spawned.

> [{quoted}](name=Scathlocke,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=qttJcWx2,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-10-27T04:17:28.068+0000)

> Wait, what? There's LoL ads on TV...?

Yeah it's kinda surreal when it happens
There was one for the Basketball game with Gordon Hayward.
I've seen a few on TV.
I've seen them on YouTube, maybe he meant their channel?
Huh, it’s not everyday you see a post where the title is longer than the post itself.
Plus the two comments put together so far.
I'd say it's pretty common on M&G
I mean they’re all uninformative. They use anime as eye candy then use someone who looks “evil” like {{champion:50}} and one of their marketing ploy champs like {{champion:222}}

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RibRB4UCRJI

Also found the vid he's talking about, not too difficult.

Seeing the Advertisement I do have to disagree with OP's original statement, as this is very informative.

Don't feed the Darius.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I28XJ-TU2CM

?
Could you perhaps link it to us?

> [{quoted}](name=Summonah12369,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=qttJcWx2,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-10-26T17:13:10.572+0000)
>
> Could you perhaps link it to us?

It featured Darius catching someone on his ax and then slamming them into the ground. I Googled but can't find it.

_You’re_ uninformative and stupid.

This is the first time I’ve been able to throw an insult back at somebody and actually mean it.

You have not gone in-depth whatsoever as to what specifically you felt was wrong and what you would like to see. On top of that, you actually thought you would be able to change the minds of any of Riot’s marketers with that sorry excuse for feedback.

> [{quoted}](name=Kairoptra,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=qttJcWx2,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-10-26T16:11:07.564+0000)
>
> _You’re_ uninformative and stupid.
> 
> This is the first time I’ve been able to throw an insult back at somebody and actually mean it.
> 
> You have not gone in-depth whatsoever as to what specifically you felt was wrong and what you would like to see. On top of that, you actually thought you would be able to change the minds of any of Riot’s marketers with that sorry excuse for feedback.

I provided more information about what I thought of the ad than the ad told me about the game (I could barely even tell it was a video game ad, unlike the ads for Red Dead 2 and other games that were also showing), and I wasn't insulting you or anyone else when I said that the ad was stupid, so you didn't really throw an insult back at me so much as take offense at a review and then personally attack the reviewer. I'm sorry that your feelings are attached to 10-15 seconds of sponsored anime.
Left handed blitz?

> [{quoted}](name=Rainynight Janna,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=qttJcWx2,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2018-10-30T12:06:49.220+0000)
>
> Left handed blitz?

Well, it's anime, and Japanese is read from right to left, so...

I also heard some adds in a restaurant, when I heard the dude say "I haven't seem the sun in years!" I wanted to choke on my food and it was my mom's birthday celebration. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Why don't we just design better adds? 

I just watched the Adult Swim one - and even though I play this game, I was confused. I can only imagine what a person who never saw the game would think.

It reminds me of those Mobile Advertisements where they use completely different footage. I would have thought this was an Anime fighting game.

Can commission many anime inspired shorts.
Still won't hireca studio to make an original Exports anime

Rito plz
The only one I like is the one where {{champion:266}} fcks up {{champion:23}}, because fuck that champion. Also because of their still painfully vague lore connection.

They should take the example from Italian commissioned-to-youtubers ads.

Yes, they are cringy and stupid as fuck. But at least they  somehow describe the game

They should really just stick to the cinematics.
https://youtu.be/uaDQB8lOlTk
https://youtu.be/ZSGdN4hOiLc
These are pretty good, no need for tryndamere fractured leg basketball player allegory, or just cringe lan party anime trailer.
I mean you've made it abundantly clear you're extremely biased against virtually anything Rito does so you aren't the best reviewer.
But everyone who shares his views can upvote him on the boards so why not make this topic? Its not like he can make this topic on reddit.
